name: Sterilor
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sterilor x. p.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Just ask Alexa to “open sterilor x. p.” to get information about your pool.
 
 This information is about whether the water treatment is on or off, the pH value, the redox value, the electrolysis power, whether the cover is open or closed, the remaining volume in the pH container.
 When a water treatment anomaly is detected, there is a prompt to check the parameters in the Stérilor XP mobile app.
 
 A Stérilor XP Connect control box is required to communicate with the assistant.
